backend/main.mo: Motoko actor that manages user profiles stored in a Principal-keyed map, with access control enforcing that only authorized users can read/write their own profiles and admins can view any profile.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report confirming the Google Search Console HTML verification file was added to the frontend public directory with the required content.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: JSON-formatted summaries of all frontend source files, describing the purpose and key implementation details of each component, page, hook, and tool.
frontend/index.css: Global Tailwind CSS entry point defining CSS custom property design tokens for light and dark themes, including background, foreground, card, sidebar, and chart color variables.
frontend/index.html: HTML entry point for the PDF Vaulty app that loads pdf-lib, jsPDF, and XLSX from CDN for browser-side processing, and mounts the React app at the root div.
frontend/public/google61423bcf1843cd2d.h: Google Search Console HTML verification file served as a static asset to verify site ownership.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Root React component that manages authentication state, active tool routing between LoginPage/Dashboard/ToolPage, profile setup modal display, and wraps the app in ThemeProvider with dark default.
frontend/src/components/Footer.tsx: App footer displaying copyright year, a caffeine.ai attribution link with UTM tracking, and a privacy note.
frontend/src/components/Header.tsx: Sticky app header with logo, nav links, theme toggle, globe icon, user name display, and login/logout button, styled with explicit light/dark Tailwind classes.
frontend/src/components/ProfileSetupModa: Modal dialog shown on first login that collects the user's display name and saves it to the backend via the useSaveCallerUserProfile mutation.
frontend/src/components/shared/FileUploa: A reusable drag-and-drop file upload component that supports single/multiple files, file removal, and reordering via move-up/move-down controls.
frontend/src/components/tools/CompressPD: A tool component that compresses an uploaded PDF client-side using pdf-lib and displays before/after file size results before triggering a download.
frontend/src/components/tools/ExcelToPDF: A tool component that converts an uploaded Excel file to a styled PDF using XLSX and jsPDF, rendering each sheet as a table on landscape A4 pages.
frontend/src/components/tools/ImageToPDF: A tool component that converts one or more uploaded JPG/PNG images into a multi-page PDF using jsPDF, preserving each image's native dimensions.
frontend/src/components/tools/MergePDFTo: A tool component that merges two or more uploaded PDF files into a single PDF using pdf-lib and downloads the result.
frontend/src/components/tools/PasswordPr: A React component that allows users to upload a PDF and set a password, then re-saves the PDF with updated metadata using pdf-lib. Includes a disclaimer that true AES encryption is not supported in the browser.
frontend/src/components/tools/PDFToWordT: A tool component that extracts text from an uploaded PDF via raw byte parsing and exports it as an RTF file compatible with Microsoft Word and LibreOffice.
frontend/src/components/tools/RotatePDFT: A React component that lets users upload a PDF and rotate all its pages by 90°, 180°, or 270° using pdf-lib, then downloads the rotated file.
frontend/src/components/tools/SplitPDFTo: A React component for splitting a PDF into separate files by various modes: all pages, a page range, specific pages, or fixed-size chunks, using pdf-lib.
frontend/src/components/tools/WordToPDFT: A React component that extracts text from an uploaded .docx file and generates a formatted PDF using jsPDF, with a note that complex formatting may not be preserved.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: A custom React hook that creates and caches an ICP backend actor using the current Internet Identity, initializing access control and invalidating dependent queries when the actor changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Provides an Internet Identity authentication context and hook, managing AuthClient creation, login/logout flows, identity persistence, and login status states.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Defines React Query hooks for fetching and saving the caller's user profile via the ICP backend actor.
frontend/src/index.css: Global stylesheet that imports Inter font, sets up Tailwind directives, and defines CSS custom properties for light and dark themes using OKLCH color values.
frontend/src/lib/pdfUtils.ts: Utility helpers that provide safe accessors for CDN-loaded PDF libraries (pdf-lib, jsPDF, XLSX) and helper functions for triggering file downloads and formatting byte sizes.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Application entry point that mounts the React app with QueryClientProvider and InternetIdentityProvider wrapping the root App component.
frontend/src/pages/Dashboard.tsx: Authenticated dashboard page displaying a hero section and a 2-column grid of PDF tool cards that navigate to the selected tool on click.
frontend/src/pages/LoginPage.tsx: Public landing page mirroring the dashboard layout where each tool card triggers Internet Identity login instead of navigating to a tool.
frontend/src/pages/ToolPage.tsx: Wrapper page that renders the appropriate PDF tool component based on the selected ToolId and provides a back-navigation button.
frontend/src/types/jspdf.d.ts: TypeScript ambient declarations for the jsPDF library accessed via the window.jspdf CDN global, covering the jsPDF class and its core methods.
frontend/src/types/jszip.d.ts: Retained reference type declarations for JSZip (no longer actively used), describing the JSZip class and its async file-reading interface.
frontend/src/types/pdf-lib.d.ts: TypeScript ambient declarations for the pdf-lib library accessed via the window.PDFLib CDN global, covering PDFDocument, PDFPage, PDFImage, and helper functions.
frontend/src/types/xlsx.d.ts: TypeScript ambient declarations for the SheetJS XLSX library accessed via the window.XLSX CDN global, covering WorkBook, WorkSheet, and utility functions.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Utility functions for extracting, persisting, and clearing URL parameters from both query strings and hash-based routing, with sessionStorage fallback support.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Tailwind CSS configuration defining dark mode, custom color tokens (including vault and chart palettes using OKLCH), typography, container queries, animation plugins, and custom keyframes.
project_state.json: Project state manifest for PDF Vaulty, tracking version, existing features (Merge, Split, Compress, Image-to-PDF, conversions, Rotate, Password Protect), architectural notes, and known issues like a broken theme toggle.
